item.content:
Hey,

I have started this blog to log my interview experiences especially after having a break. I had 5 months break in my career. You can find more details about my work experience in another blog. I also found a better way to get referrals and news about job openings in better companies. More about this at the end of this blog.

The order of Interviews I attended:

Samsung Research and Development Institute Of Bangalore:

There is an entire blog on it, you can find it here

CredAvenue (Yubi):

One day a staff from intervue.io contacted me and describe me about the role, asked whether I am interested or not. He saw my profile on naukri. He scheduled a interview

Coding Round:

- Few problems on trees
- I am able to solve it and he asked few questions on trees.

Result: Passed

The recruiter on behalf of yubi scheduled another interview. He mentioned that it will on LLD, work-experience, coding

Tech Interview:

Result:

Shardeum:

Similarly like Yubi, but this time it is from ultragenius. Shardeum is on web3 platform which I am not interested. As it isn’t stable and which help green revolution.

But I just want to attend the interview for practise sake.

Meet with Ultragenius:

She describe the role and responsbilities. She also gave information about the whole process and prerequisities needed. I clearly understood, it doesn’t fit to me.

Meet with Shardeum:

This is a introductory call from shardeum to explain more about the company and to know my work-experiences basically more about me.

Finbox.ai:

Similar fashion,

Coding Interview:

Need to arrange the elements in the array according to freq in decreasing order and 
if the freq is same then the order should be similar to orginal order.

input:  [5, 2, 3, 3, 2, 4, 2, -1]
output: [2, 2, 2, 3, 3, 5, 4, -1]

I solved it and he asked the time complexity,testcases, test function

Result:

Qube Cinemas:

I have applied it on LinkedIn for golang backend role. The recruter sent a mail with the assesment of deadline 1 week(better to complete ASAP)

The assement is here. Solution is in v1 branch (refer Usage.md in v1)

Result:

Platforms:

  • Naukri
  • LinkedIn
  • Almaconnect (Best as you will get referrals along with the new opening news, also quick hiring process, you also get the news earlier than naukri and LinkedIn)
